attributes.additional_details:
I think bootcamps should be brought into this country.
There is far too much disrepect to the juidicial system.
The punishments don't work!
Age group 16-25
Good hard labour and learning not to answer back.
No prison's or young offenders institutions,sraight to boot camp.
Run by ex miliatry and probation service.
Just like 'Bad Lad's Army'.
This country would'nt except National Service,but i belive this solution would benefit so many.
I would like to think a few people would agree with me on this and if vote thank you.
